Well, actually, according "the guys" I'm "The Purple Princess", but highne=
ss will do. 
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@yahoo=
.comDate: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 21:19:42 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Spiraling ou=
t of control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!




Indeed you are, =
Frank!Master of BoxologyWell Wishes,Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Fr=
ank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>> > Boxologist....PH.d> > > To: EVP-=
ITC@...: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 20:05:03 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] R=
e: Spiraling out of control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!> > > =

isby@ wrote:>> > "Boxology"? I like it!> > Ann> > > -----Original Message--=
---> >From: Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@>> >Sent: Dec 3, 2007 10:13 AM> >T=
o: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com> >Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of contro=
l- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!> >> >> > Yeah, I am the master!=
 But... that's only when the Ol' Lady ain't looking over my shoulder! I hav=
e to tell everyone--she's pissed!!!! Way too much time in the basement, and=
 way to much money spent on something she considers useless. I'm rushing on=
 yet another proto type, one that gets rid of random mode, and has all func=
tions, linear, with direct voice mode, or though a sound chamber. Then---it=
's time to play with tones. > > > > Random mode, depsite the professed theo=
ry out there, no longer works for me, maybe it's psychological, but the dam=
n circuits won't even function. Random in the #24 box would not work at all=
 at the Stanley, so I' am abandoning that function. I know what Moon claims=
 about the raw having to be random--simply not true, that was based on my a=
ssumptions about how the box worked in the early days of boxology. "> > > >=
 Frank-S> >> >> >To: EVP-ITC@: bulletbabea@: Sun, 2 Dec 2007 18:26:41 -0800=
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of control- Enough of the namecalling =
and fighting!!> >> >> >> >> >> >To ALL members of this group,> >I agree wit=
h Steve. Ive told you all this many times yet some of you like to get caugh=
t up in the heat of the moment.> > > >It is very disturbing to watch you al=
l try to win this war of words. There is no winner just a bunch of losers. =
And while you are busy losing theres no GOOD research being performed by YO=
U.> > > >How much research did YOU do today? How much time did you spend fi=
ring off replies to attempt to respond to someone you dont even know about =
something that doesnt even involve YOU? How much time did you spend replyin=
g to join in the arguments you feel do involve YOU?> > > >The point being, =
this is a research group for ITC not a boxing room and definitely your own =
personal battlegrounds. Take that elsewhere. Healthy discussion is one thin=
g but I have seen very few people offering that. In fact I know a few of yo=
u joined here just to go after someone who ticked you off. Then there are t=
hose who just seem to be firing in all directions, taget doesnt matter.> > =
> >Get a grip people!! Ive seen 4 year olds with more self control. If you =
arent interested in researching ITC for yourself then what the heck are YOU=
 doing HERE. > > > >ONCE AGAIN THIS IS AN ITC RESEARCH GROUP!! > > > >As fo=
r the box Frank is and always has been the first/primary tester of any box =
he has built. > > > >lol> >Misty> > > >P.S. I think you all are capable of =
finding better things to do, if not let me know and I will give you a few i=
deas =3D)> >Steve Hultay <urkel23@> wrote:> >> >> >I think we should all fo=
cus at the research at hand and forget what everyone else is doing. I perso=
nally know Chris and think he's a great guy and frank feels the same way mo=
st days. This has gotten to the point where i can't even do a session anymo=
re because i'm so blocked by negative thoughts from this group it's pointle=
ss to concentrate on the box and get results. Honestly who cares what chris=
 does anyway, does it really affect everyone's lives that much. I have a jo=
b and this is a hobby that i used to really like, but now this board has br=
ought me down. It seems all people want to do is make this like a street fi=
ght with challenges and negative views and for what reason? If anyone is co=
ncerned about hearing Chris's audio, i have about 2 hours of box sessions f=
rom Eastern State on my web site for all to listen to. It's www.keyportpara=
normal.com and go to investigation and click on eastern state. All the audi=
o is at the bottom of that page and you guys can judge for yourself and i h=
eard a lot come out of that box that night personally because i repeated a =
lot of stuff back to chris that i heard. Enough already, let's move on to t=
he next great thing. That radio shack hack was a great breakthrough here, l=
et's just be happy we got that before it was shut down. Now we have another=
 avenue to go down, but we can't do it with all these negatives out there. =
Let's move on to new topics and anyone out there that bought a Radio Shack =
box, start sharing your files with the group so it's not just us same 5 tha=
t post all the time.-Steve H.> >> >> >Be a better sports nut! Let your team=
s follow you with Yahoo Mobile. Try it now. > > > >> >> >> >> >> >> >______=

 new ways with Windows Live.> >http://www.windowslive.com/connect.html?ocid=
